name: Great Bear Promotions "Romanticize Us"
description: Great Bear Promotions proudly presents its' final two shows of 2013 as 'The Ballad of Oli Thomas' and 'Intelligent Input Darlin' come to DVD. Relive some of the biggest matches including Jonathan Gresham vs. 'Deadly' Damon Leigh and Joshua Bodom vs. Sam Bailey!

name: Great Bear Promotions Wristband
description:
Are you a fan of Great Bear Promotions brand of Wrestling? Prove it with a purchase of this wristband!

Wristband is made of Silicon.

name: Battle Kingdom 2: Where in The World is Lince Dorado?
description:
The show that Lince Dorado called 'pretty cool' is now available for you to buy! Filmed and edited by our lovely new production crew this is the best looking DVD we've ever put out!

Matches include:
Chris Brookes v.s. Damian Dunne
Cyanide & The Henchmen vs. Evan Sarven, HoHo Lun & Matt Fox
Light Heavyweight Tournament First Round Match -
Mark Andrews vs. Joey Vega
Saxon Huxley vs. Dylan Roberts
Light Heavyweight Tournament First Round Match
Morgan Webster vs. Kamil Aleksander
Great Bear Grand Title Best Two Out Of Three Falls Match
Damon Leigh (c) v.s. Joey Hayes

With all those brilliant matches lined up there really is no excuse not to pick up a copy today!

name: Adventures in Pro Wrestling!
description:
Relive all the action from our first two shows of 2013, featuring names like Zack Sabre Jr, Jonathan Gresham and Chuck Taylor alongside Great Bear mainstays such as Sam Bailey, Chris Brookes and Damon Leigh!

The DVD includes:

Championship Chase Final - For the GB Grand Championship;
'Deadly' Damon Leigh vs 'Superstylin' Sam Bailey

Two Hungry Young Talents Collide;
Josh Bodom vs. Tyler Bate

International Stand Out Match;
Jonathan Gresham vs. Zack Sabre Jr.

Great Bear Championship First Defence!

Three way number one contenders match!

And much, much more!

name: "Straight Buzzin' Robotussin'/GB in Beartown" Double DVD!
description:
Ohhhhhhhhhh snap son! 

Brand new to DVD home video release it's our November extravaganza "Straight Buzzin' Robotussin'"! BUT, we're so generous we're giving you the rough-director-bear cut of our September show "Great Bear in Beartown" absolutely free as an added bonus! 

This means you get all these matches..

"Straight Buzzin' Robotussin'"
Cyanide vs. Pitbull
The Henchmen vs. Track & Field
CC Round 2: Sam Bailey vs. LA Austin
Joey Hayes vs. Josh Bodom
The Dunne Brothers vs. Evan Sarven & Tyler Bate 
CC Round 2: Chris Brookes vs. Damon Leigh w/ Melanie Price

"Great Bear in Beartown"
CC Round 1: Chris Brookes vs. Tyler Bate
Cyanide vs. 'Spitfire' Tomas Jackson
Team DEFEND (Eddie Dennis, Pete & Damian Dunne) vs. Great Bear Army (Pitbull, Corey Edwardson, Soner Durson)
CC Round 1: LA Austin vs. Saxon Huxley
CC Round 1: Damon Leigh vs. Evan Sarven
CC Round 1: Sam Bailey vs. Xander Cooper

...for just Â£10!

Buy now! It's winter and we have cubs to keep warm.

name: Great Bear Promotions "Beartown Crab" T-Shirt
description:
Be one of the first to own the Great Bear Promotions 2013 design, the "Beartown Crab"! 

Paying homage to days of grapple yesteryear from all around the globe.

Critics are already calling it this Winter's "must-have" wear! Yes, it's a t-shirt but wear it under multiple other layers and it proves to be very toasty!

T-Shirts are old school screen printed white on black Gildan Soft t-shirts.

name: "Battle Kingdom" DVD
description:
The DVD of Great Bear Promotions - Battle Kingdom finally hits the shelves and is ready to go! With 6 brilliant matches this DVD is well worth purchasing either if you were at the event or not!

Matches include:
Pitbull vs Axl Rage
Eddie Dennis vs Evan Sarven
Chris Brookes vs. Jonathan Gresham
Behnam Ali vs. Jack Gallagher
Damon Leigh vs. Corey Edwardson
Pete Dunne vs. Sam Bailey
